# default initialisation

# props

name (required) type default notes
tableColumns array undefined
title any undefined
initialState string "table"
chartOptions object { "headerStyle": "primary" }
tableOptions object { "headerStyle": "primary", "actions": { "noActions": true, "filter": false } }
chartRowKey string function _default() { return "value"; }
chartColKey string function _default() { return "date"; }
dataSource array undefined
className any undefined
needsRefresh any undefined
